original_text: They shall also gird themselves with sackcloth, and horror shall cover them; and shame shall be upon all faces, and baldness upon all their heads.
korean_text: 그들이 굵은 베로 허리를 묶을 것이요 두려움이 그들을 덮을 것이요 모든 얼굴에는 수치가 있고 모든 머리는 대머리가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: They shall also gird themselves with sackcloth
and shame shall be upon all faces
and baldness upon all their heads
